verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the things <S%G4012>whereof<s%> <S%G3739><s%> you <S%G1125>wrote<s%> to me: It is <S%G2570>good<s%> for a <S%G444>man<s%> not to <S%G680>touch<s%> a <S%G1135>woman.<s%>

<S%G1161>Nevertheless,<s%> to <S%G1223>avoid<s%> <S%G4202>fornication,<s%> let <S%G1538>every<s%> man <S%G2192>have<s%> his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G1135>wife,<s%> and let <S%G1538>every<s%> woman <S%G2192>have<s%> her <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G435>husband.<s%>

Let the <S%G435>husband<s%> <S%G591>render<s%> to the <S%G1135>wife<s%> <S%G3784>due<s%> <S%G2133>benevolence:<s%> and <S%G3668>likewise<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G1135>wife<s%> to the <S%G435>husband.<s%>

The <S%G1135>wife<s%> has not <S%G1850>power<s%> of her <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> but the <S%G435>husband:<s%> and <S%G3668>likewise<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G435>husband<s%> has not <S%G1850>power<s%> of his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> but the <S%G1135>wife.<s%>

<S%G650>Defraud<s%> you not <S%G240>one<s%> the <S%G240>other,<s%> <S%G1509>except<s%> it be with <S%G4859>consent<s%> for a <S%G2540>time,<s%> that you may <S%G4980>give<s%> yourselves to <S%G3521>fasting<s%> and <S%G4335>prayer;<s%> and <S%G4905>come<s%> <S%G1909>together<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> that <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G3985>tempt<s%> you not for <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G192>incontinency.<s%>
But I <S%G3004>speak<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> by <S%G4774>permission,<s%> and not of <S%G2003>commandment.<s%>

For I <S%G2309>would<s%> that <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> were <S%G2532>even<s%> as I <S%G1683>myself.<s%> But <S%G1538>every<s%> man <S%G2192>has<s%> his <S%G2398>proper<s%> <S%G5486>gift<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3739>one<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3779>after<s%> <S%G3779>this<s%> <S%G3779>manner,<s%> and <S%G3588>another<s%> <S%G3779>after<s%> that.
I <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G1161>therefore<s%> to the <S%G22>unmarried<s%> and <S%G5503>widows,<s%> It is <S%G2570>good<s%> for them <S%G1437>if<s%> they <S%G3306>abide<s%> <S%G2504>even<s%> as I.
But <S%G1487>if<s%> they <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1467>contain,<s%> let them <S%G1060>marry:<s%> for it is <S%G2909>better<s%> to <S%G1060>marry<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> to <S%G4448>burn.<s%>
And to the <S%G1060>married<s%> I <S%G3853>command,<s%> yet not I, but the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> Let not the <S%G1135>wife<s%> <S%G5562>depart<s%> from her <S%G435>husband:<s%>

But and <S%G1437>if<s%> she <S%G5562>depart,<s%> let her <S%G3306>remain<s%> unmarried <S%G22><s%><S%G2228>or<s%> be <S%G2644>reconciled<s%> to her <S%G435>husband:<s%> and let not the <S%G435>husband<s%> <S%G863>put<s%> <S%G863>away<s%> his <S%G1135>wife.<s%>

But to the <S%G3062>rest<s%> <S%G3004>speak<s%> I, not the <S%G2962>Lord:<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G1135>wife<s%> that <S%G571>believes<s%> not, and she be <S%G4909>pleased<s%> to <S%G3611>dwell<s%> with him, let him not <S%G863>put<s%> her <S%G863>away.<s%>

And the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G435>husband<s%> that <S%G571>believes<s%> not, and if he be <S%G4909>pleased<s%> to <S%G3611>dwell<s%> with her, let her not <S%G863>leave<s%> him.

For the <S%G571>unbelieving<s%> <S%G435>husband<s%> is <S%G37>sanctified<s%> by the <S%G1135>wife,<s%> and the <S%G571>unbelieving<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%> is <S%G37>sanctified<s%> by the <S%G435>husband:<s%> <S%G1893>else<s%> <S%G686><s%> were <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G169>unclean;<s%> but <S%G3568>now<s%> are they <S%G40>holy.<s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G571>unbelieving<s%> <S%G5562>depart,<s%> let him <S%G5562>depart.<s%> A <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> a <S%G79>sister<s%> is not under <S%G1402>bondage<s%> in <S%G5108>such<s%> cases: but <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G2564>called<s%> us to <S%G1515>peace.<s%>

For <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> you, O <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> you shall <S%G4982>save<s%> your <S%G435>husband?<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5101>how<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> you, O <S%G435>man,<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> you shall <S%G4982>save<s%> your <S%G1135>wife?<s%>

But as <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G3307>distributed<s%> to <S%G1538>every<s%> man, as the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> has <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> one, <S%G3779>so<s%> let him <S%G4043>walk.<s%> And <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1299>ordain<s%> I in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1577>churches.<s%>

Is <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G2564>called<s%> being <S%G4059>circumcised?<s%> let him not <S%G1986>become<s%> <S%G1986>uncircumcised.<s%> Is <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> in <S%G203>uncircumcision?<s%> let him not be <S%G4059>circumcised.<s%>
<S%G4061>Circumcision<s%> is <S%G3762>nothing,<s%> and <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> is <S%G3762>nothing,<s%> but the <S%G5084>keeping<s%> of the <S%G1785>commandments<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
Let <S%G1538>every<s%> man <S%G3306>abide<s%> in the <S%G5026>same<s%> <S%G2821>calling<s%> <S%G1722>wherein<s%> <S%G3757><s%> he was <S%G2564>called.<s%>

Are you <S%G2564>called<s%> being a <S%G1401>servant?<s%> <S%G3199>care<s%> not for it: but <S%G1499>if<s%> you <S%G1410>may<s%> be <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G1658>free,<s%> <S%G5530>use<s%> it <S%G3123>rather.<s%>

For he that is <S%G2564>called<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> being a <S%G1401>servant,<s%> is the <S%G2962>Lord's<s%> <S%G558>freeman:<s%> <S%G3668>likewise<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> he that is <S%G2564>called,<s%> being <S%G1658>free,<s%> is <S%G5547>Christ's<s%> <S%G1401>servant.<s%>
You are <S%G59>bought<s%> with a <S%G5092>price;<s%> be not you the <S%G1401>servants<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>
<S%G80>Brothers,<s%> let <S%G1538>every<s%> man, <S%G1722>wherein<s%> <S%G3757><s%> he is <S%G2564>called,<s%> <S%G1722>therein<s%> <S%G5129><s%> <S%G3306>abide<s%> with <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G3933>virgins<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2003>commandment<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord:<s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> I <S%G1325>give<s%> my <S%G1106>judgment,<s%> as one that has <S%G1653>obtained<s%> <S%G1653>mercy<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> to be <S%G4103>faithful.<s%>

Are you <S%G1210>bound<s%> to a <S%G1135>wife?<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> not to be <S%G3089>loosed.<s%> Are you <S%G3080>loosed<s%> from a <S%G1135>wife?<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> not a <S%G1135>wife.<s%>

And they that <S%G5530>use<s%> <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> as not <S%G2710>abusing<s%> it: for the <S%G4976>fashion<s%> of <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G3855>passes<s%> away.

But I <S%G2309>would<s%> have you <S%G275>without<s%> <S%G275>carefulness.<s%> He that is <S%G22>unmarried<s%> <S%G3309>cares<s%> for the things that belong to the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> he may <S%G700>please<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord:<s%>
But he that is <S%G1060>married<s%> <S%G3309>cares<s%> for the things that are of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> he may <S%G700>please<s%> his <S%G1135>wife.<s%>

There is <S%G3307>difference<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3307>between<s%> a <S%G1135>wife<s%> and a <S%G3933>virgin.<s%> The <S%G22>unmarried<s%> <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3309>cares<s%> for the things of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> that she may be <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> in <S%G4983>body<s%> and in <S%G4151>spirit:<s%> but she that is <S%G1060>married<s%> <S%G3309>cares<s%> for the things of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> she may <S%G700>please<s%> her <S%G435>husband.<s%>

And <S%G5124>this<s%> I <S%G3004>speak<s%> for <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G4851>profit;<s%> not that I may <S%G1911>cast<s%> a <S%G1029>snare<s%> on you, but for that which is <S%G2158>comely,<s%> and that you may <S%G2145>attend<s%> on the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G563>without<s%> <S%G563>distraction.<s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G3543>think<s%> that he <S%G807>behaves<s%> himself <S%G807>uncomely<s%> <S%G1909>toward<s%> his <S%G3933>virgin,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> she <S%G5230>pass<s%> the <S%G5230>flower<s%> of her <S%G5230>age,<s%> and <S%G3784>need<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1096>require,<s%> let him <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> he <S%G2309>will,<s%> he <S%G264>sins<s%> not: let them <S%G1060>marry.<s%>

<S%G1161>Nevertheless<s%> he that <S%G2476>stands<s%> <S%G1476>steadfast<s%> in his <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G318>necessity,<s%> but <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G4012>over<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G2307>will,<s%> and has <S%G5124>so<s%> <S%G2919>decreed<s%> in his <S%G2588>heart<s%> that he will <S%G5083>keep<s%> his <S%G3933>virgin,<s%> <S%G4160>does<s%> <S%G2573>well.<s%>

<S%G5620>So<s%> <S%G2532>then<s%> he that gives her in <S%G1547>marriage<s%> <S%G4160>does<s%> <S%G2573>well;<s%> but he that gives her not in <S%G1547>marriage<s%> <S%G4160>does<s%> <S%G2573>better.<s%>
